Every day, countless documents are printed out.
Yet, can we do it by reusing paper?
The inspiration came from fading doodle pen for kids.
We readjusted the ink formula and used it in printer ink box.
With one simple setting change on the computer,...
...the fading ink gives new life to used paper.
After a few days, the contents on the page disappeared gradually...
...and the paper could be used again.
We printed fading letters so that more people would know about it and start using it.
The movement to save paper has received positive responses.
By using fading ink to print, 60% of papers can be saved.
